overview: Live from his own theatre on the Wellington Pier in Great Yarmouth! Enjoy over an hour of Jim's hilarious take on life and find out what grows in the sand on Yarmouth beach, why women can't be pilots and find out the secret to getting Chalkie's car started!
tagline: Sit back and enjoy one of our finest British comedians at his best!
title: Jim Davidson: Uncovered And Uncensored
